metadata.title: CVE-2023-28487 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Sudo before 1.9.13 does not escape control characters in sudoreplay output.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.9.9-1ubuntu2.4
sudo-ldap - 1.9.9-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.9-1ubuntu2.4').
